name: Spine AI
headline: Reliable AI data analysts that know your business
description:
Customized AI analysts that understand your business, and can handle your data in any format.
Teach it the context from your business, and test improvements at scale as you expand your use cases. 
Find answers in databases, documents, pdfs, slide decks, and spreadsheets. 
Gather your insights from every source in one place, to align teams and drive decisions.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:analytics; industry:conversational-ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Akshay Budhkar, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CEO at Spine AI. Previously @ Georgian Partners (Helped 40+ B2B SaaS, led Gen AI & 5 Applied research initiatives, released a few open-source toolkits to help companies at scale), Scribd (YC S06) and FarmLogs (YC W12). Did Gen AI in my Masters @ UofT before it was cool :)

founders.name: Ashwin Venkatesh Raman, Founder
founders.description: Founder and CTO at Spine AI. Previously at Instacart, AWS, Alexa, Nvidia and UWaterloo.

## Unlock better decisions this quarter with Spine
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/7Uc9mvqXrftuBHAcz2DsJ4CN0.svg)
Empower decision makers
Make it possible for business users to get an instant gut check, explore the big picture, or the details. Without constantly building custom reports.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/HEx41U177ozn5BwNBdYgQQOveg.svg)
Customized for your business
Our semantic layer captures your business context, so you can converse with your data in truly natural language
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4Xwj2ift5lScd0c2EIs0wqBCA.svg)
Reliable insights
Our purpose built Data Processing Unit (DPU) performs reliable operations on the dataset.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ruFklTW8iqarBZWyOOX4rgEZ3o.svg)
Ongoing evaluation
Our evaluations leverage both human feedback and AI analysis to ensure continuous improvement of the product.
## Build understanding, not just queries
Get direct answers to the important questions, instead of spending time fighting with confusing queries or inflexible dashboards
### Deep business insight & intelligence
Real data driven decision making relies on understanding the details and the big picture. Our natural language chat makes it possible to explore any question freely and easily.
You:
You:
How is Acme's customer acquisition going?
How is Acme's customer acquisition going?
Assistant:
Here's the acquisition metrics for the past year, based on the acme_users table, broken down by channel:
Here's the acquisition metrics for the past year, based on the acme_users table, broken down by channel:
Organic
Paid
Paid
In-app sharing
In-app sharing

Mar
May
Jul
Sep

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/jKVv0DzDMbzSCTiGzvBhMUik8.webp)
### Custom reporting with rich context
Seeing your metrics is not enough. Build custom reports that integrate relevant data, and search across documents to help make sense of trends.
Add data to your report
Pick as many sources as you like. Spine will intelligently arrange them for you.

## Flexible, reliable, and secure by default
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/MsEJXx7NMLsKEqEdkcaIMsQrjs.svg)
Works with any data store
We can accommodate any structured data. Connect your CSVs, APIs, and databases to our product.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/382Ct8SOwM20GRhAXv1la7xlZc.svg)
Explainable and customized
Our proprietary DPU allows for explainable, individually tested and domain fine-tuned modules that work at scale
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/oyqqBLLvHBkSgLaAlKGSy4e0wPg.svg)
Truly natural language
Our semantic layer allows us to accurately interpret and handle natural language questions across multiple large datasets
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/A7JrHvARUaQFTpcUc0pKdHlhsk8.svg)
Rigorous evaluation
Combined automated and human evaluations give us an objective way of measuring performance â€” both before and after we deploy the analyst.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/rsFqDCr3EmQzRjsruh19Fugcf4.svg)
Secure by default
Isolate data between users with our built-in tenant isolation. Access is scoped to the user's permissions, just like the rest of your front end.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/J2jFhNAtAvkH1pHYESEmrhZ7o.svg)
Founded by a world-class team
Our team has helped bring to life over 40 AI products. We have 100+ citations, 500+ Github stars, and 2 patents.
## Give your customers insights to drive their business
We also have several interface options to build customer facing AI analysts that integrate with your product. 
### Insights page
An embedded chat interface, report builder, and flexible dashboards

## How we deliver an AI analyst that understands your business
1
Onboard
Identify the scope of your AI analyst, gather domain context to create custom embeddings and representative examples to train against.
2
Test and refine
Test the initial version with your live data, evaluate for consistency, and refine based on human feedback.
3
Deploy and monitor
Deploy to your users, and monitor on an ongoing basis to ensure accuracy.
## Backed by the best
## Get a custom AI analyst in the next 30 days
Companies using advanced insights are 3x more likely to experience double digit YoY revenue growth. **Join them.**

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Spine AI**

Founded in 2023, Spine AI is a San Francisco-based startup that's already making waves in the AI space. Backed by Y Combinator's Batch S23, it operates with a nimble team of five, aiming to revolutionize how businesses handle their data.

**Mission:**
Spine AI's core mission is to provide reliable AI data analysts that understand your unique business context. Initially launched as customized AI analysts, the company has quickly escalated to help organizations leverage their data more effectivelyâ€”regardless of the format.

**Key Features:**
- **Conversational Analytics**: With Spine AI, users can engage with their data using natural language, allowing for a seamless and intuitive experience when extracting insights.
- **Data Integration**: The platform can interact with a variety of data sources, from databases and documents to PDFs and spreadsheets. This gives teams a unified view of all their insights.
- **Continuous Improvement**: By incorporating both human feedback and AI assessments, Spine AI ensures that its analytics capabilities improve over time, adapting to the changing needs of businesses.
- **Custom Reporting**: It enables real-time reporting and data visualization, eliminating the need for tedious custom reports.

**Product in Action:**
Imagine being able to ask, "How is Acme's customer acquisition going?" and getting an immediate analysis of metrics broken down by channels, all without having to wrestle with complex queries or rigid dashboards. This is what Spine AI promisesâ€”instant insights that empower decision-making throughout your organization.

**Long-Term Vision:**
